products.title: PineApple
products.description: A tropical plant with an edible fruit; it is the most economically significant plant in the family Bromeliaceae.

products.title: Bread
products.description: Bread is a staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water, usually by baking.

products.title: Coca cola
products.description: A carbonated soft drink manufactured by the Coca-Cola Company.

products.title: Nurofen
products.description: buprofen is a medication in the nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) class that is used for treating pain, fever, and inflammation.

products.title: Potato
products.description: The potato is a starchy tuber of the plant Solanum tuberosum and is a root vegetable native to the Americas.

products.title: Cucumber
products.description: Cucumber is a widely-cultivated creeping vine plant in the Cucurbitaceae family.

products.title: Banana
products.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa

products.title: Paracetamol
products.description: Paracetamol, also known as acetaminophen, is a medication used to treat fever and mild to moderate pain.

products.title: Fanta
products.description: Water, sugar, concentrated orange juice (3%), carbonic acid, citric acid acid, citrus extract (1%), natural orange flavor with other natural flavors.

products.title: Steak
products.description: A meat generally sliced across the muscle fibers, potentially including a bone. It is normally grilled, though it can also be pan-fried.

products.title: Calcium citrate
products.description: Calcium citrate is the calcium salt of citric acid. It is commonly used as a food additive (E333), usually as a preservative, but sometimes for flavor.

products.title: Chocolate Cake
products.description: The Most Amazing Chocolate Cake is moist, decadent, chocolatey perfection with a batter that is made in just one bowl.

products.title: Sprite
products.description: A colorless, lemon and lime-flavored soft drink created by The Coca-Cola Company.

products.title: Pepsi
products.description: Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by PepsiCo.

products.title: Strepsils
products.description: A brand of throat lozenges manufactured by Reckitt. Strepsils throat lozenges are used to relieve discomfort caused by mouth and throat infections.

products.title: Kvass
products.description: A fermented cereal-based low alcoholic beverage with a slightly cloudy appearance, light-brown colour and sweet-sour taste. It may be flavoured with berries, fruits, herbs or honey.
